title: How do you change the text editor font?
content: Change the default font Select gedit ▸ Preferences ▸ Font & Colors. Uncheck the box next to the phrase, “Use the system fixed-width font.” Click on the current font name. … After you have chosen a new font, use the slider under the list of fonts to set the default font size. Click Select, and then click Close. Ezzee Fonts
creator: stellaelliott337

title: Ever Since Monterey Update- Firefox Makes My Fan Run Excessively
content:
Dear Mozilla,

Any chance I'm not alone in that my MacBook Air (2020, with Intel Core) runs the fan excessively ever since the Monterey update? Big bummer. I'm mostly using Safari these days even though I'd rather use Firefox, because FF is just to taxing on my machine now(is this an Apple conspiracy- joking/not joking?). Any chance you're working with Apple or on your own to find a solution to this problem?

Any insight/info help would be appreciated.

Thank you,

M.
creator: mekabra

title: Unable to sync firefox bookmarks and saved logins from my previous mac device
content:
Hi Everyone - I was using firefox on my previous macbook pro and I shifted to a new macbook pro. On my older device I had logged in to the firefox and I was expecting my bookmark and saved login data to be backed up. Since I had to stop using that device, I logged out of my firefox account, and deleted everything on that device. I do not have any access to the older device.

Recently I started using the new device and logged into firefox using the same login on the new device. I cannot see any of my bookmarks and saved logins from my previous device getting synced to the new device.

How can this be resolved?
creator: abhi1407

title: Download my Firefox sync data
content:
Hello

Google has a service called "Takeout" through which users can download all of Chrome's synchronized data, including history and bookmarks, in a zip file.

Does Mozilla have such a service for Firefox sync?

title: Getting Error: Request failed with status code 404 , attempting to access a route on my dev server
content:
I have no problem using Chrome , Brave browser to access pages on my dev server. My front end (React) is on localhost 3000, server is localhost 3001. This used to work, just two weeks ago. I'm on FF v95.0.2.

I've tried everything, headers in my index.html, cleared cookies and cache, various network settings, ran it in troubleshooting mode, restarted FF. I have all cors request enable on the server.

Anything I might be missing ?

edit: Found my mistake, had another app opened on the same port , apologies.
creator: sambient

title: When using a custom profile, I cannot get the "fill in remembered logins" setting to persist between sessions.
content:

I'm on Linux, firefox 95 in case it matters.
